attributes.additional_details:
The current lockdown needs to be lifted in order for our economy to get moving again. We’re already facing financial hardship due to the lockdown that is in place and by this continuing, more people will lose their jobs, more companies will close and more people will be left destitute. postpone events already waiting since march for refunds on holidays with the inability to plan for the future.
many families have had new additions to their families but no one has been able to support them because of all the restrictions in place which is leaving a major concern over the health and wellbeing of new families.
attributes.background: Even reviewing the data by postcode areas would benefit the city greatly so more definition on what is and is not in lockdown.
